title: WHY THE FUCK DID THIS HAPPEN
body: FUCKING BULLSHIT RIOT YOUR AUTO BAN SYSTEM IS GARBAGE. I WAS IN A GAME WITH A HOMPHONE WHO FED MY LANE PURPOUSLY BC I ACCIDENTLY TOOK HIS KRUGS. HE TAXED ME ALL LANE. HE CALLED ME SHIT, %%%GOT AND STUFF LIKE THAT. YET I  CHAT ReSTRICTED. FUCKING BS GAME

replies.body:
Hey there,

The system you're referring to doesn't look at context, nor should it.

It looks at YOUR chat and YOUR behaviour, if someone is abusing you, you shouldn't stoop to their level and abuse them back, simply mute the offending player and then report them in the post-game screen.
